channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Garbage Dumped in the Garden, 30th November
item.description:
Passersby frequently dump their garbage in the garden area, which causes hygiene and safety concerns for the residents.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Charlton Church Lane, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Where indicated and nearby, 30th November
item.description:
A lot of leaves here in this section of Exeter Rd from the roundabout in Mapesbury Rd until more or less where arrow indicates Sorry no time to take photos Thank you
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mapesbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees cut down and cuttings left where they fell. Have shattered windscreen off car on the drive and could easily collapse and fall on anybody causing significant injury, 30th November
item.description:
No protective fencing around the garden no maintenance on the property grounds
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Long Lane, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street covered in rubbish again, 30th November
item.description:
Street and pavement is covered in rubbish again. Sort it out and find a regular solution. There are no bins so someone needs to come every few days. Been persistently poor for months. Come on Hackney!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tottenham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bridleway has a barrier across it., 30th November
item.description:
Bridleway 181 has a barrier across it. Site code: BR 181 272

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large hole in paving, 30th November
item.description:
There is a large hole in the paving, where it looks like a paving stone has been removed. It appears to be related to a poor installation by Thames Water, so if that was recent, you may wish to get them back to repair it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Nelson Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Foliage still blocking light, 30th November
item.description:
The giant hedge from the house next to the alleyway was trimmed last week, but the top was left and this is the part that still blocks the light from brightening the Durban Road end of the alleyway! It’s absolutely pitch black between the two houses and with the gas flue on the side of the house at 82, it’s very dangerous. There needs to be more light in the alleyway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Durban Road, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sewage spill covering entire street on Sylvester Path from sanitation truck., 30th November
item.description:
9:30 pm walked my dog along Sylvester Path and found the entire street COVERED in wastewater, including A LOT of visible human waste, which appeared to have come from a sanitation truck parked there with the engine running. Like a stream of human waste.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sylvester Path, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pedestrian acess gate has been stolen overnight, & is being used by motorbike & food couriers to acess the motorway & is a danger to pedestrians & children using the footpath to school, there is also a damaged section of gixed steel fencing adjacent to no 10 the Avenue br5 3dl, which also is dangerous to passing pedestrians/school children, 30th November
item.description:
A newly installed pedestrian acess gate has been stolen overnight! Also there is alarge section of steel fencing adjacent to no 12 the Avenue br5 3dl which is the result of a police car chase, resulting on the chased car ploughing into the railings, leaving them in a damaged & potentially dangerous to passing pedestrians/children on there way to school

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, The Avenue, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road Subsidence – Urgent Safety Concern for Motorcyclists/Cyclists and risk to motor users, 30th November
item.description:
Hello, There is noticeable subsidence on the road surface in this area. The uneven and dipped section poses a serious risk, particularly to motorcyclists, as it can cause instability or loss of control. Please arrange for an urgent inspection and repair to ensure the road remains safe for all users. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodcroft, Palmers Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Plastics flytipped onto Marmont Road planters, 30th November
item.description:
Please remove all this that has been dumped in the planters LTN. There is also more along the western footpath along Marmont Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 93, Marmont Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish not collected, 30th November
item.description:
We have 3 bins for 8 flats. I took my rubbish down today and all 3 bins are overflowing and there are bags on the floor. I have no idea when collection day is but its clearly been missed.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Homer Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bus shelter 0111 1005 at bus stop Eltham Park Gardens towards Kidbrooke : shelter light out for more than a week now, 30th November
item.description:
Bus shelter 0111 1005 at bus stop Eltham Park Gardens towards Kidbrooke : shelter light out for more than a week now See attached photographs Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Way Relief Road, Well Hall, Greater London

item.title: Large pot hole, 30th November
item.description:
There is a large and deep pothole on the southbound approach toward Southgate, just after the zebra crossing. The pothole is significant enough to cause damage to alloys, suspension, and tracking, and it poses an even greater risk to motorcyclists. Please arrange for urgent inspection and repair. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chase Side, Cockfosters, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish outside the house, 30th November
item.description:
There has been rubbish out outside the house and there are foxes and rats seen
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Johns Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London

item.title: The council has been marked in 2 areas of Manor Way. No repair has been completed, 30th November
item.description:
This issue was reported September. I assume the 2 marked areas of damaged pavement Manor Way is for repair dates? No repairs have been completed yet. When will this work be completed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Way, Barnehurst, Greater London

item.title: Kasher Joinery bins are full, 30th November
item.description:
Bins are full and trash is all over the pavement! Council needs to keep the area clean for residents.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 227-255, Ilderton Road, Bermondsey, Greater London

item.title: Drain cover, 30th November
item.description:
The drain cover it loose, and with this being a busy road with lots of cars day and night it’s causing a very loud noise everytime a car drives over it
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Longleigh Lane, Bexleyheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lighting not working, 30th November
item.description:
Hi, The street lights from approx no 72 Adley Street to where the street meets Meeson St. Lights are not working leaving the street v dark at night. I have noticed this for some time now and initially thought it might just be a temporary problem.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Adley Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
